title: [搬运][1.8.1] KAEVATOR MODS 斜面 更新至v2.3
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-11-11 16:08 编辑 

斜面 mod
作者：Kaevator

更新至v2.3
11/03/2011: SuperSlopes v2.3, corrected some of the light issues10/11/2011: Updated to MC 1.8.1, lighting problems due to new lighting system in Minecraft

115下载↓（需要 ModLoader）






推存材质，即下方视频的材质（ 刺客信条材质）
[cyan_wool]原帖    http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/268340-32x194-assassincraftrenaissancewip-overhaul-pre-release/ 
[blue_wool]          http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/634797-parkour-assassins-creep-open-world/ 
[lime_wool]搬运贴http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=11685 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjk3Njc1NzE2/v.swf


http://v.minecraftxz.com/player.swf?ID=gzgSV9MOkS8

replies.txt_content: 这mod很不错的 可惜兼容有点不好 因为添加了一堆新的合成方案 和resugami的柜子mod就冲突
